title: The Master Series Box Set One
description: She Got More Than She Bargained For…Student Elizabeth works in a dead-end hotel job to makes ends meet. But she dreams of a better life.When she foolishly decides to shower in the penthouse bathroom of one of the hotel guests, it has consequences she did not expect.A BDSM, Billionaire, Erotic RomanceReviews5 “I loved this series!! 😉 Elizabeth's meeting of Richard is like a BDSM tale of Goldie Locks fantasy, but with a redhead and sexual pleasure beyond compare. If you are into a little kink without any real gore, just pleasure to the ultimate degree, you will enjoy this series and all the books that follow!! Do not miss this series ladies!! You will enjoy!! 😉” Esther5 “Surprisingly enjoyable! It left me wanting so much more that I just had to buy the rest of the box set in the series! I don't normally like this BDSM books, but I received this box set for free and thought I would give it a go... I actually found this box set very enjoyable and because of that, I decided to buy the rest of the series.” Deena5 Stars "HOT HOT HOT ... " Rhonda Hicks VINE VOICE5 “Super hot & sexy.
